name: group-exercise-1
description: - **Engine:** Node.js + Express.js. - **View Engine:** Handlebars (`hbs` or `express-handlebars`).     - *Requirement:* Must use a `main.hbs`layout with `header` and `footer` partials. - **Security:** Middleware to disable `x-powered-by`. - **Persistence:** In-memory storage (Global Array). - **File Handling:** Implement `multiparty`to handle item image uploads to a `/public/uploads` directory.
